mapper.select: SELECT a.ch as nCh ,a.usercode as szExtension ,a.userpos as nPos ,a.STATUS as nStatus ,a.starttime as startTime ,a.uid as szAgentID ,a.NAME as szAgentName ,a.callerid as szPhoneNumber ,DATEDIFF(second,starttime,getdate()) as nStatusTime FROM ( SELECT a.ch ,a.usercode ,a.userpos ,b.STATUS ,b.starttime ,b.endtime ,b.uid ,c.NAME ,d.callerid ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY a.usercode ORDER BY b.starttime DESC ) rowno FROM userlist a LEFT JOIN statrecord b ON a.usercode = b.extno LEFT JOIN operator c ON b.uid = c.uid LEFT JOIN calllog d ON b.callid = d.id ) a WHERE a.rowno = 1
